mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT IF(COUNT(*)=0,1,COUNT(*)) FROM BOARD WHERE BRD_DATE > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) ) BCNT, (SELECT IF(COUNT(*)=0,1,COUNT(*)) FROM STUDYBOARD WHERE STD_REG > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) ) SCNT, (SELECT IF(COUNT(*)=0,1,COUNT(*)) FROM COMMENT WHERE CMT_DATE > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) ) CCNT, (SELECT IF(COUNT(*)=0,1,COUNT(*)) FROM GROUPBOARD WHERE GRB_DATE > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) ) NCNT, (SELECT IF(COUNT(*)=0,1,COUNT(*)) FROM GROUPMESSAGE WHERE GRM_DATE > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) ) GCNT, (SELECT IF(COUNT(*)=0,1,COUNT(*)) FROM MESSAGE WHERE MSG_DATE > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) ) MCNT

SELECT VDATE, COALESCE(VCNT,0) AS VCNT ,COALESCE(MCNT,0) AS MCNT FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(VIS_DATE, '%H') AS VDATE, COUNT(*) AS VCNT FROM VISIT WHERE VIS_DATE > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -6 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(VIS_DATE, '%H') ) VISIT LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MBR_JOIN, '%H') AS MBR_JOIN, COUNT(*) AS MCNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MBR_JOIN > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 6 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(MBR_JOIN, '%H') ) MEMBER ON VISIT.VDATE = MEMBER.MBR_JOIN

SELECT MBR_NO, MBR_TYPE, MBR_AUTH, MBR_CODE, MBR_ID, MBR_PASS, MBR_EMAIL, MBR_NICK, MBR_PROFILE, MBR_CONNECT, MBR_JOIN, COALESCE(PNT_NO,0) AS PNT_NO, COALESCE(PNT_SCORE,0) AS PNT_SCORE FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN POINT ON POINT.PNT_ID = MEMBER.MBR_ID ORDER BY MBR_JOIN DESC

SELECT MBR_NO, MBR_TYPE, MBR_AUTH, MBR_CODE, MBR_ID, MBR_PASS, MBR_EMAIL, MBR_NICK, MBR_PROFILE, MBR_CONNECT, MBR_JOIN, COALESCE(PNT_NO,0) AS PNT_NO, COALESCE(PNT_SCORE,0) AS PNT_SCORE FROM ( SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MBR_ID = #{id} ) MEMBER LEFT JOIN POINT ON POINT.PNT_ID = MEMBER.MBR_ID

SELECT BRD_NO, BRD_TYPE, BRD_DIVIDE, BRD_ID, BRD_TITLE, BRD_CONTENT, BRD_GNO, BRD_STEP, BRD_INDENT, BRD_COUNT, BRD_AVAILABLE, BRD_DATE, MEMBER.MBR_PROFILE, MEMBER.MBR_NICK FROM ( SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY BRD_NO DESC ) BOARD JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_ID = BOARD.BRD_ID

SELECT STD_NO, STD_ID, STD_GROUP, STD_DIVIDE, STD_ADDRESS, STD_PLACE, STD_TITLE, STD_CONTENT, STD_START, STD_END, STD_LIMIT, STD_LAT, STD_LNG, STD_AVAILABLE, STD_UPDATE, STD_REG, MBR_NICK, MBR_PROFILE FROM ( SELECT * FROM STUDYBOARD ORDER BY STD_NO DESC ) STUDYBOARD JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_ID = STUDYBOARD.STD_ID

SELECT GRM_NO , GRM_GNO , GRM_ID , GRM_DATE , STD_GROUP , STD_DIVIDE , STD_ADDRESS , STD_PLACE , STD_TITLE , STD_CONTENT , STD_START , STD_END , STD_LIMIT , STD_LAT , STD_LNG , STD_AVAILABLE , STD_UPDATE , STD_REG , STD_PERSONCOUNT , MBR_NICK , MBR_PROFILE FROM GROUPMEMBER JOIN STUDYBOARD ON STUDYBOARD.STD_NO = GROUPMEMBER.GRM_GNO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GRM_GNO AS GRC_GNO , COUNT(*) AS STD_PERSONCOUNT FROM GROUPMEMBER ) GROUPCOUNT ON GROUPCOUNT.GRC_GNO = GROUPMEMBER.GRM_GNO JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_ID = GROUPMEMBER.GRM_ID GROUP BY GRM_GNO ORDER BY GRM_GNO DESC
SELECT MSG_NO, MSG_ROOM, MSG_TYPE, MSG_FROM, MSG_TO, MSG_TEXT, MSG_RECEIVE, MSG_DELETE, MSG_DATE FROM ( SELECT * FROM MESSAGE ORDER BY MSG_NO DESC ) MESSAGE
